actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution relative to posting prices of gasoline and diesel products by retail marketers.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Energy Office should promulgate regulations covering the posting of prices of gasoline and diesel products by retail marketers so that such prices will be conspicuous to the passing motorist.

titles.title: Resolution relative to posting prices of gasoline and diesel products by retail marketers.
